name: Slap Simulator
description:
Slap Simulator: Zuckerberg Edition is the first slap-only fighting game, finally freed of any unnecessary tinsels: you won’t move, you won’t level up, you won’t be bogged down by bothering NPCs asking you to fetch them a couple dozen eggs or the family heirloom. In SS:ZE you will only slap!

You might ask: “Ok, I’ve been slapping Zuckerberg for quite a while now, what’s next?” Well dear Slapper™, your mission has only just begun: brace yourself and prepare your mighty palms to hit Leonardo, Musk, Gates and even Renzo Piano in the next updates!
